location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1617/447 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire to The Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing correspondence between the Residency Surgeon and Pelly with regards to granting bills of health and citing letter No.131 of 18 January 1872 which laid down rules for the Residency Surgeon to examine a ships crew to ensure that any epidemics being suffered at ports had not been passed on to the vessel and its crew.A postscript to the letter dated 21 November 1872 reports that the Assistant Residents at Bushire had received further complaints regarding the Residency Surgeon.
